string-array.item: Welcome to Rectball. In this tutorial I\'ll explain you the how to play.
This is the board. This is where all the fun happens during a game.
This is the timer. When it empties, the game is over.
And this the score. As you add points, they will be showed here.
To make points in Rectball, you\'ll have to make a rectangle using the colors.
Press four balls that are the same colour and that form a rectangle.
Excellent! That was easy, now let\'s try to make a bigger rectangle.
Very good! The bigger the rectangle is, the more points you get.
Awesome! You see now how easy it is? Now let\'s play a real game!
